album.title: 1994-06-22: Check Your Threads: Astoria, London, UK

track.name: Rhymin & Stealin
comments: This reminds me of being about 14 and getting chased by glue sniffers up the local park!
ALI BABA AND THE FORTY THIEVES --- YEAH!
The drum beat of When The Levee Breaks and the guitar riff of Sweet Leaf...combined into a single entity.
ALLI BABA AND THE FORTY THIEVES
I believe this song may have been the inspiration for Rage Against the Machine's "Fuck you I won't do what you tell me!" :)

Adam Yauch went from Licensed to Ill to Paul's Boutique in two years. One was good, the second was a masterpiece. What growth and what an artist! I liked when 3rd Bass tried to "dis" them. God, they destroyed them with Professor Booty!
The samples in this one are sick. Black Sabbath "Sweat Leaf", The Clash "I Fought The Law", and Led Zepplin "When The Levee Breaks".

I used love this album back in elementary school. Oh hell, I still listen to it from time to time. 

RIP MCA
RIP MCA!!! YOU WILL BE FOREVER MISSED!
